description:
In discussion with Matt Riedemann we have discovered that Nova is not using the V2 API when running tests in the gate.  Given that the V2 API is deprecated in Juno and going to be removed in Kilo we need to fix this ASAP.

Assigning this against Cinder at the moment as it is really up to the Cinder team to fix this.
title: nova is not using Cinder V2 API in the check/gate

comments.content:
In discussion with Matt Riedemann we have discovered that Nova is not using the V2 API when running tests in the gate.  Given that the V2 API is deprecated in Juno and going to be removed in Kilo we need to fix this ASAP.

Assigning this against Cinder at the moment as it is really up to the Cinder team to fix this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jsbryant

comments.content: Joe Gordon has started a patch for this:  https://review.openstack.org/#/c/124468/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jsbryant

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/124468
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=bc516eb0178ec2ecee3c7f55f7400326bec8ec09
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit bc516eb0178ec2ecee3c7f55f7400326bec8ec09
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 26 10:11:39 2014 -0700

    Switch default cinder API to V2
    
    Cinder v1 is deprecated and using v1 emits a warning (introduced in
    Id8abbbb4d9b0c8c49ab51fc3d958ef0d487467f8). So update the default value
    to Cinder v2.
    
    DocImpact
    
    Closes-Bug: #1390131
    
    Change-Id: Ica650962c9354d741b464ec152e9e1c6d0d5fa10
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
